name: Rootstock
description:
Cornelius is a greenhouse owner and is struggling to save his business. When he was about to give up, he found an old occult book with information on how to breed mutated plants. At first, he struggles to understand the book, but has he completes recipes he learns to understand the rest of the book. Your goal is to help Cornelius earn enough money to keep his plant shop open.

Rootstock was made during a game jam sponsored by the Madison game development group FemDev. FemDev is a group promoting gender diversity for women, non-binary, femme, and girl-identifying people in the games industry. The groups aims to strengthen the community of Madison game developers through events and networking opportunities.
